summary: Based on the Aramoana Massacre that occurred on 13 November and 14 November 1990. Resident David Gray, an unemployed gun collector, went on a rampage in which 13 people were shot dead, before Gray himself was shot by police.
cast: Matthew Sunderland|Stuart Mathieson|Natalie Ellis|Patrick Paynter|Steven Moore|Phoebe Smith|Georgia Fabish|Simon Ferry|Danaka Wheeler|Lois Lawn|Timothy Bartlett|William Kircher|Tandi Wright|Jacinta Wawatai|Baxter Cannell|Thomas Lee-Batley|Karl Urban|Kerrie Waterworth|Brenda Kendall|Ashley Wilson|Vanessa Stacey|Tony Bishop|Fayth Rasmussen|Fatu Ioane|Michael Whalley|Bruce Phillips|Claire Waldron|Finn Liddell|Vaughan Slinn|Paul Glover|Richard Knowles|Ryan O'Kane|Nick Duval-Smith|Richard West|Dra McKay|Murray Davidson|Christina Hughes|Brian Kilkelly|Cindy Diver|Mark Neilson|Nicola Rodger|Wilbur McDougall|Pauline Lane|John Lane|Peter Tocher|Martin Corbett|Stefan Lane|Rob Young|Neal Barber|Dave Dudfield|Matt Enright|Jemima Fallows
title: Out of the Blue
